dominated.engineer_taunts05: You're all about to have a real bad day!

scout.engineer_dominationscout01: Y'all gotta run a lot faster than that.
scout.engineer_dominationscout02: Ya ain't too fast for me and my machines now, are ya? Heh. Are ya?
scout.engineer_dominationscout03: Boy, this here is just gonna keep happenin' and happenin'.
scout.engineer_dominationscout05: Y'all just got dominated, city boy.
scout.engineer_dominationscout06: What in Sam Hill were you thinkin', string-bean?
scout.engineer_dominationscout07: Shoot, son, y'all slow as molasses.
scout.engineer_dominationscout10: Quick as a hiccup, ain'tcha? Huh. [whispering] Not quick enough.
scout.engineer_dominationscout11: Not fast enough; not by a damn sight.

soldier.engineer_dominationsoldier02: That there is just a sad display, boy.
soldier.engineer_dominationsoldier05: Y'all just got drafted into my war!
soldier.engineer_dominationsoldier06: That's what it feels like when eagles cry, soldier-boy.
soldier.engineer_dominationsoldier07: Next time, lift your lid and you might see it comin'!
soldier.engineer_dominationsoldier08: This all's what happens when you fight a man.

pyro.engineer_dominationpyro05: Sorry to put out your campfire, boy.
pyro.engineer_dominationpyro06: You look a mite tongue-tied, son.
pyro.engineer_dominationpyro07: You shouldn't have played with fire, boy.
pyro.engineer_dominationpyro08: Didn't yer momma teach ya not to play with matches?
pyro.engineer_dominationpyro09: Y'all might be flame retardant, but ya sure ain't bulletproof.

demoman.engineer_dominationdemoman01: I wish y'all could see how bad I'm kickin' your tail.
demoman.engineer_dominationdemoman02: Drunk on the battlefield ain't no way to be, son.
demoman.engineer_dominationdemoman05: The hand is quicker than the eye!

heavy.engineer_dominationheavy01: Never mind the bullets. How much all these coffins costin' ya?
heavy.engineer_dominationheavy02: I've seen better sides of beef been run over by a combine.
heavy.engineer_dominationheavy11: You're dumb as a box of rocks!
heavy.engineer_dominationheavy12: Y'all come back now! More where that came from.
heavy.engineer_dominationheavy14: You are a whole herd'a ugly.

engineer.engineer_dominationengineer01: You just ain't doin' it right.
engineer.engineer_dominationengineer03: A real Texan woulda dodged that.
engineer.engineer_dominationengineer04: You can always tell a Texan, but you can't tell 'em much.
engineer.engineer_dominationengineer05: You done incurred my wrath, son!
engineer.engineer_dominationengineer06: I'm wolverine-mean, you son of a bitch.
engineer.engineer_dominationengineer07: If ya done it, it ain't braggin'!
engineer.engineer_dominationengineer08: You're all hardhat and no cattle.
engineer.engineer_dominationengineer09: You shoulda oughta brought more gun, son.

medic.engineer_dominationmedic01: Doctor! I am the better man!
medic.engineer_dominationmedic02: Guess they didn't teach you to duck in doctor school!
medic.engineer_dominationmedic03: Keep comin' at me, doctor; eventually y'all gonna rustle up some sense.
medic.engineer_dominationmedic04: Next time, tend to your own knittin', sawbones.
medic.engineer_dominationmedic05: Sell your tonics elsewhere, miracle man.
medic.engineer_dominationmedic06: You must be a doctor, 'cause you just saw the extent of my patience!
medic.engineer_dominationmedic07: I'm a killer of men, doc. That is the God's honest truth.
medic.engineer_dominationmedic08: Slap a poultice on that, doc! (laughs sarcastically)

sniper.engineer_dominationsniper01: Ya oughta stand back a little more, like from me and my machines.
sniper.engineer_dominationsniper02: Looks like that there just weren't the place you oughta be standin'!
sniper.engineer_dominationsniper04: You shoulda oughta stayed back at your little campsite.
sniper.engineer_dominationsniper06: I just rode you out on a rail, down under.
sniper.engineer_dominationsniper07: Aw, now ya don't look like a happy camper.
sniper.engineer_dominationsniper08: Down under? More like, six feet down under.

spy.engineer_dominationspy01: Now just stop tryin' ta mess with my contraptions.
spy.engineer_dominationspy02: It ain't gettin' any harder for me to kill ya.
spy.engineer_dominationspy03: You know where ya oughta hide next time? Back in France.
spy.engineer_dominationspy07: Slither on back to hell, coward!
spy.engineer_dominationspy08: That's what my daddy taught me to do to backstabbers.
spy.engineer_dominationspy09: You're a looooooong way from France, boy.
spy.engineer_dominationspy10: Don't go meddlin' in my business.
spy.engineer_dominationspy11: You are a coward and a scoundrel!
spy.engineer_dominationspy12: If y'all had more gadgets for killin' , you wouldn't need so many for hidin'.
spy.engineer_dominationspy13: I just beat on your sneaky ass like a mule, boy!

revenge.engineer_taunts02: You ladies shoulda' oughta' brought some menfolk with ya.
revenge.engineer_taunts04: I'm done playin' games with you, boy.
revenge.engineer_revenge01: That'll cut'cha back down to size.
revenge.engineer_revenge02: You were gettin' too big for your britches

meleedare.engineer_taunts01: I'm gonna beat you like a rented mule, boy.
meleedare.engineer_taunts03: I'm gonna tear you down, junior!
meleedare.engineer_taunts05: You're all about to have a real bad day!
meleedare.engineer_taunts12: Son! I'm gonna blow that dumb look right off your stupid face!

spy.engineer_cloakedspy03: There's a Spy creepin' around here!
spy.engineer_cloakedspyidentify10: That Spy ain't on our side!

fightoncap.engineer_standonthepoint02: Plant yerself on the point, mister!
fightoncap.engineer_standonthepoint01: Plant yerself on that darn point, mister!

helpmecapture.engineer_helpmecapture02: This point ain't gonna cap itself! Get over here!

helpmedefend.engineer_helpmedefend02: I need help defending this point!

cheers.engineer_cheers05: Now that there was a fine piece of work.

needbuilding.engineer_needdispenser01: We need a Dispenser right here.
needbuilding.engineer_needsentry01: We need a Sentry right here.
needbuilding.engineer_needteleporter01: We need a Teleporter riiight here.
needbuilding.engineer_needteleporter02: Somebody wanna rustle up a Teleporter right here?

autoonfire.engineer_autoonfire01: Fire, Fire! Ow oh oh oh-grr fire!

specialcompleted.engineer_specialcompleted01: Whoooowee, would ya look at that!
specialcompleted.engineer_specialcompleted07: Take it like a man, shorty.
specialcompleted.engineer_specialcompleted08: That's what it was made for.
specialcompleted.engineer_specialcompleted09: I told ya don't touch that darn thing.
specialcompleted.engineer_specialcompleted10: How'd that plan turn out for ya, dummy?

taunts.engineer_taunts01: I'm gonna beat you like a rented mule, boy.
taunts.engineer_taunts02: You ladies shoulda' oughta' brought some menfolk with ya.
taunts.engineer_taunts03: I'm gonna tear you down, junior!
taunts.engineer_taunts04: I'm done playin' games with you, boy.
taunts.engineer_taunts05: You're all about to have a real bad day!
taunts.engineer_taunts11: Why don't you all get along before one of you gets hurt?
taunts.engineer_taunts12: Son! I'm gonna blow that dumb look right off your stupid face!

sentrymoving.engineer_sentrymoving02: Outta mah way! Outta mah way!
sentrymoving.engineer_sentryplanting02: That there wasn't gettin' any lighter.

wranglekills.engineer_wranglekills01: This thing ain't on auto-pilot, son!

goldenwrenchkill.engineer_goldenwrenchkill01: That there is a gold-plated kill!
goldenwrenchkill.engineer_goldenwrenchkill02: Guess I got the Midas touch.
goldenwrenchkill.engineer_goldenwrenchkill03: At least you ain't worthless anymore.
goldenwrenchkill.engineer_goldenwrenchkill04: Erectin' a statue of a moron.

littlesentry.engineer_littlesentry01: Sometimes, you just need a little less gun.
littlesentry.engineer_littlesentry02: Ain't that a cute little gun?

frontierjustice.engineer_taunts05: You're all about to have a real bad day!
frontierjustice.engineer_taunts11: Why don't you all get along before one of you gets hurt?

dominated.scout_misc07: You're like a car crash in slow motion. It's like I'm watchin' ya fly through a windshield.

dominatedmelee.scout_misc04: Man, your skull's so soft you're makin' this easy!
dominatedmelee.scout_misc05: Pop quiz: How long's it take to beat a moron to death? (buzzer imitation) Sorry, time's up, you're dead.

scout.scout_domination05: Hey, knucklehead, you ain't gonna win.
scout.scout_domination07: Ha ha! Look at you! You look like you ran through traffic!
scout.scout_domination13: Hit the bricks, pal. You're done.
scout.scout_domination19: Yeah, I dare ya, rage quit. C'mon, make us both happy!
scout.scout_domination20: Oh, what, you gonna cry? You gonna cry now?
scout.scout_domination21: I will never... Stop... Killing you.
scout.scout_dominationsct02: This map ain't big enough for the two of us.
scout.scout_dominationsct03: Hit the road, bozo! Let a real Scout get to work!

soldier.scout_dominationsol01: Yo, I'm not even wearin' a helmet!
soldier.scout_dominationsol02: What is your major malfunction, brother?
soldier.scout_dominationsol04: You're a disgrace to the uniform, pal!
soldier.scout_dominationsol06: There ain't enough crits in the world to kill me!

pyro.scout_domination06: It's startin' to bore me how much you suck.
pyro.scout_dominationpyr02: Yo, if you didn't want me to kill ya, ya shoulda said somethin'!
pyro.scout_dominationpyr03: Repeat after me: mhmm-mhmm-mhmm I'm dead!
pyro.scout_dominationpyr04: Take that, ya dumb, bib-wearin' dope!
pyro.scout_dominationpyr05: Eat it, ya mute, frickin' moron!
pyro.scout_misc08: Dude, you'd get a closed casket at the ugly cemetery.

demoman.scout_domination01: You just got freakin' dominated, knucklehead, all right, let's do this!
demoman.scout_domination10: I don't usually kill morons this fast.
demoman.scout_dominationdem01: Yeah, next time, try two eyes!
demoman.scout_dominationdem03: The best man won, ya bomb-throwin' drunk!
demoman.scout_dominationdem04: Your clock just got cleaned, rummy!
demoman.scout_dominationdem05: Depth perception, pal. Look into it.

heavy.scout_domination08: Drink it in, pal. That's how failure tastes.
heavy.scout_domination09: Would you look at you? I mean, look at you.
heavy.scout_dominationhvy01: I am owning you, you fat, bald bastard!
heavy.scout_dominationhvy03: $400,000 to fire that gun, huh? Yeah, money well spent!
heavy.scout_dominationhvy04: Them $200 bullets ain't so hot when they don't hit nuthin', are they?
heavy.scout_dominationhvy05: I think I'll take Sasha out for a steak dinner tonight. Whataya think about that?
heavy.scout_dominationhvy06: Ain't so hard now, are ya, fatcakes?
heavy.scout_dominationhvy07: I... Eat... Your... Sandwiches. I eat 'em up!
heavy.scout_dominationhvy08: Nice hustle, 'tons-a-fun'! Next time, eat a salad!
heavy.scout_dominationhvy09: Hey, lard-fat, those hard arteries don't stop bullets, do they?
heavy.scout_dominationhvy10: I am owning you, you fat, bald, fatty fat... fat fat!

engineer.scout_domination17: Is that all you got, moron?
engineer.scout_dominationeng01: Hey, here's somethin' you can invent next time: duckin'!
engineer.scout_dominationeng02: Here's something you shoulda built: a not-dyin' machine!
engineer.scout_dominationeng03: Don't bring a wrench to a gunfight!
engineer.scout_dominationeng04: Here's a schematic for ya: my ass!
engineer.scout_dominationeng06: Lotta good that hardhat did ya!

medic.scout_misc02: If you order now, I'll throw in a second beatin', absolutely free.
medic.scout_dominationmed02: Ooh hoo hoo, your gun shoots medicine! It's intimidatin'!

sniper.scout_domination12: Look at this: just caved in your skull, my bat's still dry. No clumps of hair - nothin'.
sniper.scout_dominationsnp02: That fancy scope of yours, betcha got a real good view of me killin' ya!
sniper.scout_dominationsnp03: You camped the whole time for this?!
sniper.scout_dominationsnp04: It was a mercy killin', ya live in a... Campervan!
sniper.scout_dominationsnp05: You'll never hit me! You'll never hit my tiny head! It's so tiny, I got a frickin'... Such a tiny li'l head!

spy.scout_dominationspy03: Hard to stab a guy in the back when he's beatin' your frickin' head in, huh?
spy.scout_dominationspy04: Hehey, look, you shapeshifted into a dead guy!

revenge.scout_revenge02: How do ya like me now, blockhead?
revenge.scout_revenge06: Don't you ever cross me again!
revenge.scout_revenge07: What have we learned? I always win!
revenge.scout_revenge08: Who's the tough guy now, huh, tough guy?

meleedare.scout_misc03: I'm gonna beat on your skull 'till I hit tonsils.
meleedare.scout_taunts05: I'm gonna headbutt cha', I'm gonna headbutt cha', I'm gonna headbutt cha'!
meleedare.scout_taunts06: Yeah, come get some, you frickin' wuss!

sentryahead.scout_sentryahead03: They got a Sentry up there!

spy.scout_cloakedspy01: Yeah, there's a Spy over there!
spy.scout_cloakedspyidentify08: That freakin' Hard Hat's a Spy!
spy.scout_cloakedspyidentify06: That Spy ain't one of us!

jeers.scout_jeers08: What the hell is you guys' problem?
jeers.scout_jeers11: What the hell was that crap?
jeers.scout_jeers12: This is a real frickin' embarrassment!

negativevocalization.scout_negativevocalization05: 'Kay, this does not look good here.. um..

autodejectedtie.scout_autodejectedtie01: You have got to be kidding!

autocappedcontrolpoint.scout_autocappedcontrolpoint03: I got it, I got it!

autocappedintelligence.scout_autocappedintelligence03: I got it, I got it, I got it!
autocappedintelligence.scout_specialcompleted05: Wave goodbye to your secret crap, dumbass!

fightoncap.scout_fightoncap01: Hey, get on the cap, guys!
fightoncap.scout_fightoncap03: Let's get on the cap, fellas!
fightoncap.scout_fightoncap04: Get on the cap, ya dopes!

helpmecapture.scout_helpmecapture02: I'm cappin' over here, who's with me?
helpmecapture.scout_helpmecapture03: Am I gonna hafta capture this thing by myself?
helpmecapture.scout_standonthepoint01: Stand on the freakin' point, you moron!
helpmecapture.scout_standonthepoint02: What the hell is wrong with you? Stand on the freakin' point!
helpmecapture.scout_standonthepoint03: Get on the freakin' point dumbass!
helpmecapture.scout_standonthepoint04: Would you kindly move ya ass to the freakin' point?
helpmecapture.scout_standonthepoint05: How's the weather over there, dumbass? Get to the freakin' point!

helpmedefend.scout_helpmedefend01: Get over here and help me defend!
helpmedefend.scout_helpmedefend03: What? Am I gonna hafta defend this thing by myself?

goodjob.scout_goodjob04: Alright, yeah, that's- naw, that's a pretty good job.

go.scout_go01: Let's go, let's go, let's go!

moveup.scout_moveup01: Move it up, move it up!

headright.scout_headright02: Yeah, let's go to the right!

award.scout_award01: Hey, look at me, look at me!
award.scout_award07: No otha' class gonna do dat!
award.scout_award10: I'll put it in my trophy room, with the othas.
award.scout_award11: I don't know who to thank first... Oh, I know, me!
award.scout_award12: Bang! I make it look easy.

specialcompleted.scout_specialcompleted06: Yo, I oughta' be on a baseball card!
specialcompleted.scout_specialcompleted09: 'Ey, is somebody keepin' track of my heads batted in?
specialcompleted.scout_specialcompleted10: I broke your stupid crap, moron!
specialcompleted.scout_specialcompleted12: Ya got anything smart ta say now?

taunts.scout_taunts03: Yeah, why don't you come over and say that to my face, tough guy?
taunts.scout_taunts04: Not so tough now, are ya? Are ya?!
taunts.scout_taunts08: Say goodbye to ya kneecaps, chucklehead!
taunts.scout_taunts09: Hey, lotta' good that gun didya!
taunts.scout_taunts11: Ya head's a freakin' bat magnet!
taunts.scout_taunts12: Hey, knucklehead, I'm talking ta you!
taunts.scout_taunts16: You knuckleheads ain't even worth the effort.
taunts.scout_taunts17: You morons are about to catch a real beatin'.

apexofjump.scout_apexofjump03: Look at you chuckleheads down there!
apexofjump.scout_apexofjump04: Hey, I can see my base from here!

invincible.scout_invincible02: Ya can't hit what ain't dere!

stunballhit.scout_stunballhit01: Oh, I'm sorry, I didn't mean to hit ya... No, wait, yeah, I did.
stunballhit.scout_stunballhit02: Oh, dat's a skull fracture for sure!
stunballhit.scout_stunballhit03: Ohh, I got alla dat one.

offense/goingback.scout_cartgoingbackoffense01: Dat ain't da right way, guys!
offense/goingback.scout_cartgoingbackoffense04: Is someone gonna push da freakin' cart?

offense/stayclose.scout_cartstaycloseoffense05: We pushin' this thing or what?

offense/stopped.scout_cartstoppedoffense02: What da hell, who stopped pushin' the cart?!
offense/stopped.scout_cartstoppedoffense03: Push it, push it, push it!

defense/goingback.scout_cartgoingbackdefense03: Hey now we're doin' it, now we're doin' it!
defense/goingback.scout_cartgoingbackdefense06: Yo, it should be goin' dat way!

defense/goingforward.scout_cartmovingforwarddefense02: Aw, jeez guys, we gotta stop it!
defense/goingforward.scout_cartmovingforwarddefense03: What the hell is everyone doin'?!

scout.soldier_dominationscout02: How's that domination feel, city boy?
scout.soldier_dominationscout03: You kids today don't know how to dominate.
scout.soldier_dominationscout05: You cannot run from me, my gun is faster.
scout.soldier_dominationscout06: You run fast, my bullets run faster.
scout.soldier_dominationscout07: Never bring a bat to a battlefield, war is not a game.
scout.soldier_dominationscout08: Your mouth wrote checks, my gun has cashed them.
scout.soldier_dominationscout09: Got anything funny to say about that, funny man?
scout.soldier_dominationscout10: Never send a boy to fight a man's war.
scout.soldier_dominationscout11: You were in a big fat hurry to die, son.

soldier.soldier_dominationsoldier02: You better hope there's hacky-sack in Hell, hippie!
soldier.soldier_dominationsoldier03: You are now a conscientious objector to being dead, hippie!
soldier.soldier_dominationsoldier04: What's the matter, hippie? Hair get in your eyes?
soldier.soldier_dominationsoldier06: You're a disgrace to the uniform.

pyro.soldier_dominationpyro01: I just tore you a new chimney, Smokey Joe!
pyro.soldier_dominationpyro02: You cannot burn me, I'm already on fire!
pyro.soldier_dominationpyro03: You cannot burn me! I'm already ablaze with passion, for war!
pyro.soldier_dominationpyro04: You cannot burn me! I do not have time to combust!
pyro.soldier_dominationpyro05: Fire is for cookin' s'mores, son. Get a real gun.
pyro.soldier_dominationpyro06: Your fire-retardant ass just got dominated.
pyro.soldier_dominationpyro07: Ha! Ya fight like a girl!
pyro.soldier_dominationpyro08: How do you like that, All Quiet on the Western Front?
pyro.soldier_dominationpyro09: Get a haircut, hippie! [whispered] Just in case.

demoman.soldier_dominationdemoman02: Consider yourself dominated, you Scotch son of a bitch!
demoman.soldier_dominationdemoman04: I love your death, cyclops; your death is sweet to me like love is sweet.
demoman.soldier_dominationdemoman05: Scotland is not a real country; you are an Englishman with a dress.
demoman.soldier_dominationdemoman06: You're like the Cyclops of Greek myth; except you are Scottish, and I hate you!

heavy.soldier_dominationheavy02: Stars and Stripes beats Hammer and Sickle. Look it up!
heavy.soldier_dominationheavy05: Go play your pinko chess game with the Devil, Commie!
heavy.soldier_dominationheavy06: This American boot just kicked your ass back to Russia!

engineer.soldier_dominationengineer03: Stop hiding behind your little toys and fight like a man!
engineer.soldier_dominationengineer04: I will eat your ribs, I will eat them up!
engineer.soldier_dominationengineer05: That's where books get you, professor!
engineer.soldier_dominationengineer06: Go back to Calgary, ya cow-herdin' Canadian!

medic.soldier_dominationmedic04: Ich bin I just kicked your ass!
medic.soldier_dominationmedic05: Welcome to the United States of YOU JUST GOT DOMINATED!
medic.soldier_dominationmedic06: I'm gonna mail my boot to the Kaiser with your ass around it!

sniper.soldier_dominationsniper01: This is not a camping trip, Sheila; this is war and I love it!
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper02: You will not turn my battlefield into a campground.
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper03: Now hear this, camper, you are not wanted on my beloved battlefield!
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper04: I will send my condolences to your kangaroo wife.
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper05: You are a coward, and you died like one.
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper06: The next time you want to kill a man, look him in the eyes!
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper07: You just got dominated, Bilbo Baggins!
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper08: You just got dominated, Balbo Biggins!
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper09: You just got dominated, Bablo Bravins!
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper10: You just got dominated, Barble Bapkins!
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper11: You just got dominated, Bazbo Bibbons!
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper12: Aww, am I too violent for you, cupcake?
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper13: Your country did not prepare you for the level of violence you will meet on my battlefield!
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper14: You just got dominated, Bulbo Buttons!

spy.soldier_dominationspy02: You just got your Frenchie ass dominated.
spy.soldier_dominationspy06: Your white flag does not stop American bullets.
spy.soldier_dominationspy07: Words cannot express how much I hate France right now!

battlecry.soldier_battlecry04: Last one alive, lock the door!

spy.soldier_cloakedspyidentify09: That Spy is not one of ours!

jeers.soldier_jeers02: Each and every one of you has failed.
jeers.soldier_jeers03: Are you all trying for a Section 8?
jeers.soldier_jeers04: Which of you numbnuts let us down?
jeers.soldier_jeers05: You have dishonored this entire unit.
jeers.soldier_jeers06: You are the sorriest excuses for soldiers I have ever seen!
jeers.soldier_jeers07: Pain is weakness leaving the body.
jeers.soldier_jeers10: If I have to crack some skulls, I will.
jeers.soldier_jeers11: That was an amazing killing spree... by the other team!

autodejectedtie.soldier_autodejectedtie02: I will not tolerate failure on my team.

autocappedcontrolpoint.soldier_autocappedcontrolpoint01: Now that is what I wanna see!
autocappedcontrolpoint.soldier_autocappedcontrolpoint02: This point is mine! Do you understand that?

autocappedintelligence.soldier_autocappedintelligence02: And that is how you do it, men!

helpmecapture.soldier_helpmecapture01: You will help me capture my point!
helpmecapture.soldier_helpmecapture02: Rally round, help me cap this point!

helpmedefend.soldier_helpmedefend01: We need to defend this point!
helpmedefend.soldier_helpmedefend03: You will help me defend my point!
helpmedefend.soldier_helpmedefend04: This is my point and you will help me defend my point!

cheers.soldier_cheers03: Everyone of you deserves a medal!

moveup.soldier_moveup03: Move up, move up, move up!

hatoverhearttaunt.soldier_hatoverhearttaunt03: You were loud and ugly, and now you're DEAD! Amen.
hatoverhearttaunt.soldier_hatoverhearttaunt06: You were good son, real good; maybe even the best.

taunts.soldier_taunts02: Time to inform your next of kin!
taunts.soldier_taunts03: If you know what's good for ya, you will run!
taunts.soldier_taunts04: You are scum! You are nothin' but a buncha' cowards!
taunts.soldier_taunts05: I am going to enjoy killing each and every one of you sorry sacks of scum!
taunts.soldier_taunts06: You sissified maggot scum have just signed your death warrants!
taunts.soldier_taunts07: If God had wanted you to live, He would not have created me!
taunts.soldier_taunts08: I am going to claw my way down your throat and tear out your very soul!
taunts.soldier_taunts09: Take your lumps like a man, Private Twinkletoes.
taunts.soldier_taunts10: You are all weak! You are all bleeders!
taunts.soldier_taunts11: Each and every one of you will be sent home to your momma' in a box!
taunts.soldier_taunts12: We have you surrounded, at least from this side!
taunts.soldier_taunts13: I joined this team just to kill maggots like you.
taunts.soldier_taunts14: Do not look at me, I did not ask you a question!
taunts.soldier_taunts15: Surrender now, maggots, and you will not be harmed!
taunts.soldier_taunts16: The last word out of your sorry mouth will be Sir, and it will be loud!
taunts.soldier_taunts17: This is my world. You are not welcome in my world.
taunts.soldier_taunts18: You are a spineless worm! You are a mistake of nature! You are walking vomit!
taunts.soldier_taunts19: You are a maggot hatched from a mutant maggot egg!
taunts.soldier_taunts20: I am going to strangle you with your own frilly training bra!
taunts.soldier_taunts21: You are all maggots, you scum sucking fruit baskets!

offense/goingback.soldier_cartgoingbackoffense01: Do not let that cart roll back!
offense/goingback.soldier_cartgoingbackoffense02: The cart needs to go forward!

offense/goingforward.soldier_cartgoingforwardoffense03: I do not see enough pushing!
offense/goingforward.soldier_cartgoingforwardoffense10: Ladies, let's get this cart moving!
offense/goingforward.soldier_cartgoingforwardoffense11: You will push this cart or I will push you into a grave!
offense/goingforward.soldier_cartgoingforwardoffense12: We will push until there is nothing left to push!

offense/stayclose.soldier_cartstaycloseoffense05: Stick to that cart like glue, that is an order!
offense/stayclose.soldier_cartstaycloseoffense06: Get to the cart! Hup, hup, hup!

offense/stopped.soldier_cartstoppedoffense01: Why is that cart stopped, maggots?!
offense/stopped.soldier_cartstoppedoffense02: I do not see a cart moving, ladies!
offense/stopped.soldier_cartstoppedoffense03: Why is that cart not moving?!

defense/goingback.soldier_cartgoingbackdefense02: That's it, men, move that cart back!

defense/goingforward.soldier_cartgoingforwarddefense01: Do not let that cart go forward!
defense/goingforward.soldier_cartgoingforwarddefense02: Hold the line, men! Stop that cart!

defense/stopit.soldier_cartstopitdefense01: Stand next to the cart, damn you!
defense/stopit.soldier_cartstopitdefense03: You will stand next to that cart or I will stand you next to that cart!

meleedare.pyro_specialcompleted01: Mhhph mh mh mhhp mh mhp mhpph mhhpp!

helpme.pyro_standonthepoint01: Mrh! Hrt hr nha phrnt yrh mrprph!

taunts.pyro_taunts01: Murr hurr mphuphurrur, hurr mph phrr. (1)
taunts.pyro_taunts02: Murr hurr mphuphurrur, hurr mph phrr. (2)
taunts.pyro_taunts03: Murr hurr mphuphurrur, hurr mph phrr. (3)

scout.demoman_dominationscout04: Don't come wide with me, ye pint-sized mutt!
scout.demoman_dominationscout05: Yer like a little bunny... Scurryin' around, eatin' up yer lettuce and berries!
scout.demoman_dominationscout06: Yer so bloody TINY! Yer like a toy-sized version of a man!
scout.demoman_dominationscout07: Grow some hair on yer face, and come and try me again, lad.
scout.demoman_dominationscout08: Oh, you're a wee little miss, you are!

soldier.demoman_dominationsoldier01: DOMINATED! Ha ha ha ha ha ha!
soldier.demoman_dominationsoldier02: I'll notify yer next o' kin... That ya sucked!
soldier.demoman_dominationsoldier03: Hey, Private Haircut, I might've taken a bit too much off... Yer head!
soldier.demoman_dominationsoldier04: Mother o' mercy! Now that is a bloody domination!
soldier.demoman_dominationsoldier05: Lot o' good that Soldier trainin' did ya! I'm drunk!

pyro.demoman_dominationpyro01: You've brought shame on yer people, ya mumblin' devil.
pyro.demoman_dominationpyro02: Go home, lassie; men are fightin' here!
pyro.demoman_dominationpyro03: Go to hell, and tell the devil I'm comin' for him next!

demoman.demoman_dominationdemoman01: Thus begins my thousand year reign of blood!
demoman.demoman_dominationdemoman02: DOMINATED! I feel everything! I know everything!

heavy.demoman_dominationheavy02: Ohhh... There's a new gravy-filled angel in heaven.
heavy.demoman_dominationheavy04: Awww.... There's a new angel in heaven... IN HELL!
heavy.demoman_dominationheavy05: Little too much caber-tossin' pie down yer own throat, eh, chubby?

engineer.demoman_dominationengineer01: Don't hide behind yer toys, lad!
engineer.demoman_dominationengineer02: You're weak. I'm strong. And I win, toymaker!
engineer.demoman_dominationengineer03: That's a right pretty bra-washer ya built, ya big ugly girl!
engineer.demoman_dominationengineer04: You come wide at me again, boy, I'll stick that wrench right up yer arse!
engineer.demoman_dominationengineer05: Go on and build more o' yer little guns. I'll shove every one of them up yer arse!
engineer.demoman_dominationengineer06: If you were huntin' trouble, lad, ya found it.

medic.demoman_dominationmedic01: Dominated, ya Teutonic nursemai-(belches) Ahh... Hah.
medic.demoman_dominationmedic02: How's that doin' no harm workin' out for ya, then?
medic.demoman_dominationmedic03: Dominated! ...And I've been shaggin' yer wife! Hahah!

sniper.demoman_dominationsniper01: Perfect bloody domination, ya campy weasel!
sniper.demoman_dominationsniper03: I hate you campers; everybody bloody hates you!
sniper.demoman_dominationsniper04: It's lads like you that give war a bad name!

spy.demoman_dominationspy02: Yer a back-pokin' snake, and by God you'll die like one!
spy.demoman_dominationspy03: I hope I didn't scare you with my face-to-face man fightin!

revenge.demoman_taunts16: They're goin' ta bury what's left of ye in a soup can!
revenge.demoman_specialcompleted09: I had me good eye on you the whole time!

battlecry.demoman_battlecry06: Aigheaght's the way to do it!

meleedare.demoman_taunts03: I'm gonna stick me thumbs in yer eyes and hang on 'till yer deid!
meleedare.demoman_taunts05: Ohh, I'm gonna beat ya so hard, you'll have a twitch!
meleedare.demoman_taunts14: I'm going to strangle you with me bare hands!

jeers.demoman_jeers03: I'm drunk - you don't have an excuse!
jeers.demoman_jeers04: I feel like every bone in me body's broke!
jeers.demoman_jeers06: Ooooh, I've realllly hit rock bottom.
jeers.demoman_jeers07: Thankfully I already don't remember this.
jeers.demoman_jeers09: Buck up, lads! We'll get 'em next time.
jeers.demoman_jeers10: I almost joined their bloody team!

autocappedcontrolpoint.demoman_autocappedcontrolpoint03: Now it's our flippin' point, hehah!

autocappedintelligence.demoman_autocappedintelligence01: Aye, that's the way ye do it! Hehah!

helpmecapture.demoman_helpmecapture01: Give us a hand here with this point!
helpmecapture.demoman_helpmecapture02: Help me capture this bloody thing!
helpmecapture.demoman_helpmecapture03: Come here lad help me capture this!
helpmecapture.demoman_standonthepoint01: Stand on the bloody point, ya half-wit!
helpmecapture.demoman_standonthepoint02: Stand on the point, ya git!

helpmedefend.demoman_helpmedefend01: I can't hold them off alone heeere!
helpmedefend.demoman_helpmedefend02: I need some help holding them off!
helpmedefend.demoman_helpmedefend03: Get over here and help me defend, ya idiot!

cheers.demoman_cheers02: I love... every... single... one of ye... not you.
cheers.demoman_cheers03: Imagine if I hadn't been drunk!
cheers.demoman_cheers05: See? I told ye they were a buncha' wee lasses!
cheers.demoman_cheers06: I don't think they saw that one comin'!
cheers.demoman_cheers07: If I wasn' the man I was I'd kiss ye!
cheers.demoman_cheers08: It's a fine thing, lads, heheh.

positivevocalization.demoman_positivevocalization05: THAT'S THE WAY YA DO IT!

thanks.demoman_specialcompleted-assistedkill02: I didn't need yer help, ya know.

specialcompleted.demoman_specialcompleted01: And that's what yeh get for touching that!
specialcompleted.demoman_specialcompleted03: You appear to have trodden on a mine!
specialcompleted.demoman_specialcompleted05: That was my point you were standin' on!
specialcompleted.demoman_specialcompleted06: Next time you'll bloody ask before you stand on my point.
specialcompleted.demoman_specialcompleted07: Bloody hell, those ones were me favorites!
specialcompleted.demoman_specialcompleted08: Let that be a bloody lesson to yeh!
specialcompleted.demoman_specialcompleted10: Couldn't ya see the bloody bombs?

taunts.demoman_taunts01: All yah dandies prancin' aboot with ya heads full of eyeballs!
taunts.demoman_taunts04: Don't fret, boyo. I'll be gentle!
taunts.demoman_taunts06: I'm gonna be all over ya like shingles!
taunts.demoman_taunts08: Oh, they're goin' ta have to glue you back together... IN HELL!
taunts.demoman_taunts09: I'm goin' ta blast ya into thin gruel!
taunts.demoman_taunts10: Oh, they're gonna find ya all dead in the alley, with cats lickin' at ya!
taunts.demoman_taunts11: Not one of ya's going to survive this!
taunts.demoman_taunts13: Oooohhh, I'm goin' ta liquefy ya!
taunts.demoman_eyelandertaunt01: There can be only one... Eye!

gibberish.demoman_gibberish01: And then I'll grow yer arse's arse and I'm the grass man, punk yeah heaven's heathen...
gibberish.demoman_gibberish04: Any of you that think ye're better 'n me you're gon' have another thing c-...
gibberish.demoman_gibberish06: ...Everyone thinks I'm just a one-eyed bloody monster, god damnit... (sobbing)
gibberish.demoman_gibberish09: Gonna kill you and I'll keep killin' you and I'll never, cause you're 'onna be dead and I don't gotta kill you.
gibberish.demoman_gibberish10: Any one of you (belches) Everyone, damn it... (sobs)
gibberish.demoman_gibberish11: It's on! It's on like *snores* Wha--?
gibberish.demoman_gibberish12: Just bought two tickets to the gunshow, and I'm not givin' 'em to ya; I'm goin' with your tickets! (laughs, falls asleep) Wha--?
gibberish.demoman_gibberish13: ...Gonna take down to the pain train station in train town...

offense/goingforward.demoman_cartgoingforwardoffense02: Put yer backs into it, lads!

offense/stayclose.demoman_cartstaycloseoffense02: Stay close to that bloody cart!

defense/goingback.demoman_cartgoingbackdefense01: Roll back to Hell, ya bloody cart!

domination.heavy_domination02: You are no match for me!
domination.heavy_domination06: Hide coward! I will find you.
domination.heavy_domination07: I have squashed you like bug!
domination.heavy_domination08: I have plan for you: more pain!
domination.heavy_domination12: I am coming for you, again!
domination.heavy_domination13: I promise you pain without end.
domination.heavy_domination15: The burning you feel? It is shame.
domination.heavy_domination16: I am going to kill you, and kill you, and kill you!
domination.heavy_domination17: You are dead. Not big surprise.
domination.heavy_domination18: Killing you is full time job now.

revenge.heavy_revenge01: You mean nothing to me now.
revenge.heavy_revenge03: Let this be lesson for you.
revenge.heavy_revenge05: You are not so good as you think.
revenge.heavy_revenge07: I should have done this long ago!
revenge.heavy_revenge08: Did you think you could beat me?
revenge.heavy_revenge09: Did you think I would forget you?!
revenge.heavy_revenge10: Oh no, you I do not forget!
revenge.heavy_revenge11: I think you should fight someone much, much smaller.
revenge.heavy_revenge13: Next time, pick on someone your own tiny-baby size!
revenge.heavy_revenge14: I am not done with you yet!
revenge.heavy_revenge15: This is just the beginning of the pain I will cause you.

meleedare.heavy_meleedare05: I will kill you with bare hands!
meleedare.heavy_meleedare09: Is not fair to use gun on such a tiny man.
meleedare.heavy_meleedare10: Why waste bullet on such a teeny man?
meleedare.heavy_meleedare13: Let us fight; man versus tiny baby man.

spy.heavy_cloakedspy04: I Spy with my little eye!

jeers.heavy_jeers06: Which one of you is crying?
jeers.heavy_jeers07: Daaaagh, too many little men on this team!
jeers.heavy_jeers08: Tell me, where did we go so wrong?

autodejectedtie.heavy_autodejectedtie01: We lose, but they do not win?

autocappedintelligence.heavy_autocappedintelligence02: I killed many cowards for that.
autocappedintelligence.heavy_autocappedintelligence03: Not usually my job, but... Eheheh.

helpmecapture.heavy_standonthepoint01: You! Stupid! Come, stand on point!

helpmedefend.heavy_helpmedefend02: Who's man enough to stand with me?

cheers.heavy_cheers07: (Funeral March) Dah da da-dah da da-da-da-da-da-dahhhh!
cheers.heavy_cheers08: (Volga Boatmen) Do do doh do. Do do do do. Come sing with me! Do do do doh do.

award.heavy_award01: Look at me! Look at me!
award.heavy_award03: It is good day to be Giant Man!
award.heavy_award08: I am most dangerous man, in history of WORLD!
award.heavy_award09: Who dares stand against me NOW?
award.heavy_award12: The medal- It is so tiny!
award.heavy_award16: Now I am king of team!

specialcompleted.heavy_specialcompleted01: (Khachaturian's Sabre Dance) Ya-ta-ta-ta-ta-ta-ta-ta ya-ta-ta-ta-ta-ta-ta-ta do-de-da-va-da-da-dada! Kaboom-Kaboom!
specialcompleted.heavy_specialcompleted08: Ooohhhh, run, run, I'm coming for you!

taunts.heavy_taunts02: You are so small! Is funny to me!
taunts.heavy_taunts07: [Laughs] Look at your little baby guns!
taunts.heavy_taunts08: You, yes, you! You are dead!
taunts.heavy_taunts09: I was told we would be fighting men!
taunts.heavy_taunts10: Who send all these babies to fight!?
taunts.heavy_taunts12: I am amused by entire eety-beety-teeny team!
taunts.heavy_taunts13: I hear someone building diaper changing station!
taunts.heavy_taunts15: You are going to need much bigger guns!
taunts.heavy_taunts16: Is good time to run, cowards!
taunts.heavy_taunts17: Go ahead! Build your tiny gun, then run!
taunts.heavy_taunts18: I think you need more men!
taunts.heavy_taunts19: What sick man sends babies to fight me?
taunts.heavy_domination10: Do I smell soiled baby diaper?
taunts.heavy_domination11: Uh oh! I think someone soiled diaper!

specials.index: Killing enemy Medic while being healed

sandwichtaunt.heavy_sandwichtaunt04: I am full of sandvich, and I am coming for you!
sandwichtaunt.heavy_sandwichtaunt05: Sandvich and I are coming for you!
sandwichtaunt.heavy_sandwichtaunt07: Bologna is perfect fuel for killing tiny cowards!
sandwichtaunt.heavy_sandwichtaunt08: (Song of the Volga Boatmen) Saww-ndvich, sandvich!
sandwichtaunt.heavy_sandwichtaunt10: What was that, Sandvich? 'Kill them all'? Good idea! Hahahahahaha!
sandwichtaunt.heavy_sandwichtaunt11: Look at you tiny-itty-bitty men running from sandvich!
sandwichtaunt.heavy_sandwichtaunt12: You are a loose cannon, Sandvich, but you are a damn good cop!
sandwichtaunt.heavy_sandwichtaunt13: Sandvich and me going to beat your ass!

specialweapon.heavy_specialweapon04: All will fear my giant new gun.
specialweapon.heavy_specialweapon05: I have new way to kill cowards.

specialweaponkill.heavy_specialweapon06: New gun is unfair to tiny baby enemies.
specialweaponkill.heavy_specialweapon07: I am Heavy Weapons Guy, and this is my new weapon.
specialweaponkill.heavy_specialweapon09: Yes. I like this new weapon.

fistsofsteel.index: Kill with the Fists of Steel
fistsofsteel.heavy_specialweapon01: My fists! They are made of STEEL!

defense/goingback.heavy_cartgoingbackdefense02: We send itsy-bitsy cart back home!

defense/goingforward.heavy_cartmovingforwarddefense04: Ooooh noooooo! Little cart is moving!
defense/goingforward.heavy_singing05: (Song of the Volga Boatmen) What's the matter with you?
